exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce lb_step_execution to an evaluable reference.

original: intros. apply until_weak_until. unfold lb_step_execution in *. apply until_now_until with (P := message_delivered_label p l). split. apply H0. auto. intro. do 2 (unfold lb_step_execution in *; apply until_now_until with (P := message_enables_label p l); [split|]). apply always_now. apply now_always. apply message_enables_after_delivery. auto. apply H1. apply H2. apply always_now.
